transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good आफ्टरनून ma'am, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Good afternoon ji, main achchi hoon.
Executive: Shailza baat kar rahi hoon ma'am IndiaMART team se, Numaan ki manager. Aapse meri pehle bhi baat hui hui hai. To ma'am aaj kafi baar aapne call kiya hai Numaan ko, leads mein kafi aapko issues aa rahe the. Ussi ke regarding maine call kiya tha aur aapka ek feedback bhi aaya hai hamare paas IndiaMART WhatsApp pe not satisfy ka jo aapne Numaan ke liye diya hai.
Customer: Ji. To main jaan sakti hoon ma'am matlab kya isme aisa challenge aa gaya suddenly kyunki aap kafi time se services use kar rahe ho July se, hai na? Ye July mein aapki active ho gayi thi.
Customer: Main July se use kar rahi hoon. To ye aap discussion Numaan ji se kar lijiye kyunki humne unse saari discussion kar li hai.
Executive: Haan, mere ko maloom hai ma'am jo discussion aapka unke saath hua hai. Tabhi mere paas ye escalate ho ke aaya hai aur abhi aap main call kar rahi hoon, right? To isme ma'am dekho aap keh rahe the ki aap online rahiye matlab leads ke liye, hai na?
Customer: Online rehne ka matlab ye hai jaise hi hame lead milti hai na, jaise hi hame lead milti hai wo saath ke saath left ho jaati hai aur sir ka kehna ye hai aap active nahi hote. Unko do ghante, teen ghante ya ek ghante ke liye active rehne ka matlab ye tha ki chalo kam active nahi rehte aap khud se dekh lo ki hum kitne active rehte hain. Aur hum khud staff ke hawale nahi kiya hua hai IndiaMART. Hum khud apna IndiaMART khud check kar rahe hain. Agar staff ke hawale kar dete to kya pata hum bol dete ki staff ki galti hai. Hai na? Ki staff ki galti hai unhone check nahi kiya hoga. Hum khud active hain. Mere phone ke alawa do number mere table pe pade hain. Do phone mere table pe pade hain. Dono pe IndiaMART hai. Jis system pe main baithi hoon us system pe IndiaMART hai. Agar mujhe pure month mein ya pure din mein 100 call bhi aa rahi hai na, call meri phone pe aa rahi hai system to mere paas hai na.
Customer: To system se to main check dekh hi sakti hoon na ki system pe lead hai ya nahi hai. Jab wo mujhe lead show hui nahi hai to uska batao main kya karoon. Aur wo sold out ho jaati hai aur sold out hone ka matlab ek second ke liye to aati hai kam se kam lead. Ek second ke liye aap mante ho aapke paas koi lead aati hai, kuch cheez aata hai aapke paas ek second ke liye to aayega na. Haan, to aap hi dekh lo agar mujhe pure din mein seven lead milengi aur seven lead mein se ek customer nikal ke aayega ki haan hame requirement hai wo bhi ruk ke hai thoda wait kar lo hum just abhi check kar rahe the. To aise kaise kaam chalega ma'am? Meri to baat ho rakhi hai na ek week mein 100 lead milengi aapko pata hai hamare 60, 65, 40, 30, 37 aise lead to left ho jaati hain.
Executive: Main ek baar dekh leti hoon.
Customer: Hamari ek week weekly haan weekly lead hamari 40 plus lead left ho jaati hain. 100 lead mujhe waise hi mil rahi hain. 20 agar main consume kar bhi leti hoon, 20 mein se to feedback aapke samne hai. Aap dekho ki kaunsa customer ko requirement hai aur kaunse ko nahi hai. Aur hame lead milti hai, dusre supplier ko pehle milti hai hame do din baad lead milti hai ya do ghante baad mujhe lead milegi. Saath ke saath hame lead nahi milti.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Aur hamari ek chhoti si aapse bhi request hai. Humne jo bhi investment kiya hai na aap logon se discussion karne ke baad hi investment kiya hai. Galti ye ho gayi agar koi local sales manager hota hamari factory visit karta hum usse discussion karte to shayad hame profit achcha milta. Hame transaction bhi achcha milta. Hame lead achchi milti, inquiries achchi milti, hame call achchi milti. Aap itni door baithe ho phone call pe humne aapko order place kar diya hai. 12-13 lakh investment kar diye hain wo isliye kar diye hain kyunki hum ek din mein kam se kam aapko 50 call karte rahe lead nahi aa rahi, lead nahi aa rahi, lead nahi aa rahi. Kam se kam sales manager ek week mein ek baar aake pura account check karke wo data to bata kar jayega. Check to karega.
Executive: Aapko ma'am meeting chahiye. Dekho meeting to hum log bhi kar rahe hain online video meeting pe aur aise meeting bhi.
Customer: Ma'am aapke aapke paas dekho chahe 200 customer hai, chahe 300 customer hai, chahe 500 customer hai. Mere paas bhi ek din mein 500, 500, 600, 600 customer hote hain un sabko time dete hain. Sabko time dene ka matlab ye hota hai ki aap uski problem to sort out karaiye ki kya problem hai. Lead hame chahiye wo aap hame time to time bhejte rahiye ki customer ki lead aapki hai, koi customer isko requirement hai. Jo actual customer hota hai wo to hame dusre supplier ke baad mil raha hai.
Customer: Aur ye maine to recording pehle bhi Ankita ma'am ko bahut baar pehle bhej chuki hoon main. Numaan ji ko bhi main ye recording bhej deti hoon. Customer samne se bol dete hain hamari to baat ho chuki hai. Hamari to baat ho chuki hai. Jab aapki baat ho chuki hai aur leader humne liya hua hai to leader ka kya matlab hai? Kya benefit hai fir leader ka? Hame leader lene ka matlab kya hai? Aur maine request karke mera off season tha jab humne leader liya hua tha na. Jab humne leader liya tha na hum tab bhi lead ko leke the ki lead chalo aa nahi rahi. Madam bolti, sir bolte jyada lead milegi, jyada call milegi, jyada inquiry milegi, ye ho jayega, wo ho jayega. Kuch nahi hone wala. To hame kya jarurat thi leader wagera lene ki?
Customer: Aap khud se hamara account check karaiye. Aur product dekhiye hamare kitne achche achche saaf suthre product hain. Ek baar aap hamare product ko jaakar dekhiye. Hamare bade achche saaf suthre product hain. Har machine ka picture, har machine ki videos, har cheez achche se dala hua hai. Agar fir bhi lead na mile na to batao person kya karega?
Executive: Ma'am dekhiye lead aap aapko kis category mein pehli baat to issue aa raha hai. Aapki do category IndiaMART pe run kar rahi hai. Seed grader ki aur seed cleaning machine. To aapki jo lead sold out ho rahi hai wo seed grader ki ho rahi hai ya seed cleaning machine ki ho rahi hai?
Customer: Gravity ki bhi ho rahi hai, seed grader ki bhi ho rahi hai, jo lead hai na actual.
Executive: Aapne abhi aapne abhi category change karane ke bhi mail karwaya tha na ma'am IndiaMART mein mail karaya ki meri category change kar dijiye instead of.
Customer: Maine category change category change karne ke liye 10 minute ya 20 minute ya ek din lagta hai ma'am paanch chhe din nahi lagte. Humne category change karane ke liye mail dal diya. Turant kar di gayi hai.
Executive: Ji ma'am. Turant maine hi ki hai. Maine hi ki hai. Haan to aap meri side se approval lagta hai. Aap haan aapki side se approval lagta hai na to meri chhoti si request hai pehle. Numaan ji ke WhatsApp ke screenshot aapko deti hoon. Maine mail kab dala tha aur aapne kab category check kiya hai. Aapne turant kar diya hai na? Aapne turant kar diya hai na ma'am. Main aapne mail ki date and timing aapko share karti hoon aur aapne category kal change karaya hai ye bhi aap check kar lijiye.
Customer: Humne kal kiya ma'am change. Hai na? Turant to haan mere paas kal hi update aaya hai. Aapne kab bola tha kyunki hamare paas dekho kya hota hai.
Executive: Hamare humne bola tha paanch chhe din pehle, chhe din pehle approximate humne bola tha aur humne ye yaad dilaya hai.
Customer: Ma'am holiday to nahi tha ma'am holiday to nahi tha kyunki Numaan bhi available nahi tha office mein us time tak aur closing bhi chal rahi thi jaise Saturday Sunday office close tha ma'am. Hai na aur kal bhi matlab hamara office close hai baki dekho leads ma'am aapki mature bhi hui hongi aisa nahi hai ki matlab on the spot hi 12-13 lakh ki agar aap investment ki baat kare to.
Executive: Ma'am main aapko puch rahi hoon main aapko puch rahi hoon kaun si lead mature hui hai? Aur customer ne to bataya hoga na ki order humne Osegro ko de diya hai. Ab hamara YouTube link bhi jaakar dekhna hamara.
Executive: Ma'am ye cheez aap hi ne mere se August end mein maine ek call liya tha aapse aur September mein bhi liya hai aur October mein bhi liya hai. Jab maine aapse call li thi aapke check wagera stop bhi karwaye the hold pe dale the tabhi aap hi ne confirm kiya tha ma'am. Aur aap hi ne.
Customer: Ma'am maine confirm kiya hai ki customer maine customer maine short kiye hue hain aur ek customer ne hame token money kar dala hua hai. Us customer ne aaj tak bhi machine nahi khaya.
Executive: Ma'am ab dekhiye ab is case mein lead aap aaj kya hai aap kuch nahi is case mein aap kuch nahi kar sakte par meri ek chhoti si request hai aap ye lead hamara jo lead hai na jo hame ek week mein 98 ya 100 lead jo mil rahi hai na hame uske according buylead dijiye ma'am. Hai na? Ek week mein ek din mein aapne do teen lead de di ya unki ek ki requirement hai wo bhi soch raha hai dekh raha hai aur baki staff free baith ke ja raha hai aise bhi chalta ma'am.
Executive: Ma'am ek cheez ma'am ek cheez main aapse puchna chahungi dekho aapne jo package liya IndiaMART se pehli baat to jo investment aapne kiya wo three years ke liye kiya hai theek hai isme aapki do category chal rahi hai ek preferred leader ke liye aur preferred star ke liye jisme hum jo business de rahe hain na IndiaMART wo 400 source ke through de rahe hain aap keh rahe ho ma'am meri 60 70 lead waste ho ja rahi hai wo left ho ja rahi hai main use nahi kar pa rahi. Lekin hum aapko direct inquiry bhi to de rahe hain na jo aapki lead kai kai.
Customer: Jo direct inquiry aapne diya hua hai na us direct inquiry ko phone lagao aap dusra phone uthakar uski kya requirement hai?
Executive: Theek hai. Jo aapne direct inquiry di hai na.
Executive: Ma'am kyunki dekho hamare paas series nahi hoti.
Customer: Ma'am maine Numaan ji ko saara details bheja hua hai jo customer ko jo requirement hai na unko saara update diya hua hai. Aap mere mere saath baat karne se jyada better tha aap Numaan ji se discussion karke hamare account pe kaam karte. Ab agar main har kisi IndiaMART se call aa jaye main manager hoon ya senior hoon main unse story sunati rahoon to hamara to time bhi kharab hota hai na. Aap Numaan ji se discussion karo.
Executive: Theek hai main unse baat kar leti hoon baki ma'am ma'am ab aap directly mujhe hi call kar liya kijiye in case koi bhi services mein issue aa jata hai to. Theek hai aur yahan pe main ek baar check out kara leti hoon baki hum log video meeting.
Customer: Mujhe ek din mein achchi khasi lead customer milne chahiye hai na ya ek week ya weekly laga lijiye ki week mein mujhe kam se kam char paanch customer main short kar loon aisi mujhe lead chahiye aur na main Numaan ji ko call karungi na aapko call karungi aur ek baat aur hai aapko bhi main bata deti hoon maine kabhi Numaan ji ko force nahi kiya hai ki aap mujhe 80 lead dete ho ek week mein ya mujhe 70 ya 60 lead aati hai maine ek hi bola hua hai unko pure week mein koi do customer aise provide kara do jisko main short kar loon baki chahe 80 to 80 70 to 70 lead left ho jaye fir mujhe fark nahi padta. Hai na agar wo do lead bhi main short na kar paun na to batao kya fayda hai fir kaam karne ka. Maine Numaan ji ko ye bola hua hai mujhe 80, 70, 100 lead nahi chahiye. Pure week mein aisi lead provide kara do ki main do lead short karke side mein rakh loon aur jab aapka bhi call aaye feedback ke liye main bolun ma'am maine is week mein do customer short kiye hue hain. Hai na to main aapko kyun call karungi? Numaan ji ko kyun call karungi baar baar? Hai na agar 100 lead mein se main do customer bhi short nahi kar pa rahi hoon ek bhi nahi kar pa rahi hoon to pareshani wali baat hai na mere paas bhi staff hai. Mere paas bhi char paanch girls ka staff hai agar wo free baith ke aise ek paanch girls ka staff hai aur seven lead maine consume ki hui hai wo paanch girls seven lead se kya kis kis se kya discussion karegi aur jabki unki requirement hi nahi hai. Customer to aisa hona chahiye ki uski requirement hai wo kam se kam ek dedh ghante ke liye baat kar raha hai apna product samajhne ke liye.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am main ek baar personally isme dekh leti hoon aur aap ma'am mere ko koi bhi agar irrelevant details wagera aa rahi hai aap keh rahe ho wo mana kar rahe hain ya unke already requirement fulfill thi un lead ki ek details bana ke WhatsApp kar dijiye.
Customer: Wo Numaan ji ke paas hai na meri puri puri hamari transaction history hai na jo haan unke paas already hai nahi hai aap transaction history aapke paas hai total aap kisi ko bhi utha ke call kar do agar ek single customer ye bol deta hai na Osegro se machine ko lekar baat hui hai madam ne samjhaya hai ya mujhe requirement thi aap mujhe bol dena main kabhi complaint karungi nahi aapko.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am main ek baar dekh leti hoon iska aur catalog pe dekh ke aapke saath meeting karte hain theek hai ma'am kya isme issue aa rahe hain further.
Customer: Haan mera catalog check karo, mere products check karo itne saaf suthre products dale hue hain maine bade achche products dale hue hain aise product ko to dekh kar customer waise hi gayab ho jaye ki kitna achcha product hai kitna achcha quality hai aur yahan pe customer bhag hi jata hai ji.
Customer: Aap kabhi Osegro ka YouTube check karna YouTube se mujhe achcha khasa business milta hai.
Executive: Aaj ma'am aaj jo aapne char lead use kiye isme charo mein se aapki kya baat hui aaj abhi tak char kiye?
Customer: Abhishek se Abhishek ek Abhishek ne bola hai ki hum search kar rahe hain hamari requirement hai future mein humne usko short kar liya.
Executive: Achcha. Baki teen unko nahi hai requirement.
Customer: Baki unko 100 kilo, 200 kilo, 300 kilo, 500 kilo. 100, 200, 300 kilo, 500 kilo ka koi product hai hi nahi hai mera. Mera product 2000 kilo se leke 8000 kilo ka product hai fir bhi customer ke thoda zid karne pe ki budget nahi hai main 1000 kilo ka banakar de sakti hoon.
Executive: Achcha. Haan ji. Theek hai. Main ek baar dekh leti hoon.
Customer: Theek hai ye aap check kara lijiye ma'am please. Theek hai ji. Okay main kara dungi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads received are not relevant.

- Leads are being sold out quickly.

- Wants leads as per requirement.

- Investment not yielding expected results.

- Leads are provided to other suppliers first.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the account.

- Executive will schedule a meeting.

- Executive asked to share irrelevant lead details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check the catalog and products.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, subscription, catalog, investment, buyleads
